title: Episode 3 - Voices Convening: Resistance & Rebellion
itunes:title: Voices Convening: Resistance & Rebellion
description: Junauda and Erin go on location to the Givens Convening: Resistance & Rebellion with Adrienne Maree Brown and Walidah Imarisha editors of Octavia's Brood, Cheyenne Sewell from Yarn Mission,  Roger Guenveur Smith, and Eshay Brantley and Namir Fearce.
content:encoded: Junauda and Erin go on location to the Givens Convening: Resistance & Rebellion with Adrienne Maree Brown and Walidah Imarisha editors of Octavia's Brood, Cheyenne Sewell from Yarn Mission,  Roger Guenveur Smith, and Eshay Brantley and Namir Fearce.
itunes:subtitle: Resistance & Rebellion
itunes:author: Givens Foundation for African American Literature/iDream.tv
